content_parts.title: Stock journal inquiry: Easy access to journal entry

content_parts.content: On the Stock journal inquiry main list, you can open the associated journal entry from the document icon at the end of the line.

The Purchase order line inquiry features infinite scrolling, allowing for a smoother, continuous exploration of results. You can group results by criteria such as company, purchasing site, supplier, order date, and purchase order number. You can select one or multiple lines to export or export the entire inquiry result as a CSV file.

content_parts.title: Purchase Invoice stuck at posting in progress

content_parts.content: The status update function on Purchase invoice and Purchase credit memo has been improved.

content_parts.title: Error printing Sales Invoice  "The total amount paid could not be updated from Sage Intacct, the sales invoice cannot be printed."

content_parts.content: You can print the Sales invoice and credit memo from the main list without an error.

content_parts.title: Cannot delete an unposted purchase invoice

content_parts.content: You can delete purchase invoices that are not posted.

content_parts.title: Purchase credit memo link does not work

content_parts.content: You can access a purchase credit memo from the link in the main list.

content_parts.title: Unable to update Sage Intacct customer accounts when credit limit field is empty

content_parts.content: The Sage Intacct customer credit limits are correctly synchronized with SDMO so you can update customer records as needed.

content_parts.title: Cost calculation uses incorrect required quantity

content_parts.content: The correct required quantity for subassemblies is used when calculating the rolled up cost.

content_parts.title: The link to purchase order from a purchase receipt does not work

content_parts.content: You can navigate to a purchase order from a purchase receipt via the link in the Origin tab of the purchase receipt.

content_parts.title: Purchasing and sales: Substitute approver incorrectly displayed as the default approver

content_parts.content: The default approver is displayed when you request approval for a purchase requisition, purchase order, or sales return request.

content_parts.content:
Integrating with Sage Intacct streamlines operations for French companies by eliminating manual processes and data entry. This seamless integration minimizes disruptions and supports the automated transfer of AP/AR invoices, credit memos, general ledger transactions, and master data.

Additionally, you can integrate and sync dimensions, projects, and tasks for a comprehensive, multi-dimensional view within your financial management system.

content_parts.title: Component allocation from work orders and material tracking

content_parts.content: You can allocate stock from a Work order and from Material tracking. Select Allocate stock from the More actions icon for a component line to allocate stock from individual locations. The work order and material tracking component line displays the Allocation status.

content_parts.content: To help you manage default assignment values for stock movements related to stock receipts, sales return receipts, purchase receipts, and production trackings, you can select default storage locations and quality control statuses in relation to item-site data on the Stock rules tab.

Single status

Stock issue single status includes the stock issue status and stock status.

Main list row actions

You can perform key actions from the main list to save time such as Delete.

Additional columns for main list

You can display additional columns in the main list such as Reason and Status.
